transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Good evening, sir. Haan.
Executive: Sir, Poonam this side from IndiaMART catalog department. Actually, sir, I have called you regarding services.
Customer: Aapke yahan se toh phone aaya hua tha madam already. Aapke yahan se already phone aaya hua tha madam.
Executive: Aman ji se, right sir? Aman ji aapke account manager hain.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, sir, toh actually woh maine update nahi kiya kuch woh aap se baat bhi nahi ho pa rahi. Kya update karna chahte hain aap?
Executive: Like buyleads vagarah aap consume nahi kar rahe hain. Kya issue aa raha hai, sir? Aapka buylead. Isse pehle aapke yahan se 1000 baar phone aa chuka hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Aur maine sab baar bataya hua hai. Aapke yahan har do din baad aadmi change hoga aur har do din baad mere ko time waste karna theek nahi lagta.
Executive: Basically abhi Aman ji aapke account manager rahenge aur main catalog department se bol rahi hoon. Toh wohi aapko. Haan, catalog mein aap dekho na mere catalog jo hai.
Customer: Suno meri baat.
Customer: Aapke catalog mein dekha hai hamara kitna sara product hai aur uske regarding kitna bhi buylead aata hai.
Executive: Ek second, sir. Main check karti hoon please.
Executive: Aapka jo product hai, sir, yeh mini concrete mixer, right, sir?
Customer: Nahi. Concrete mixer hamara list item hai. Theek hai? Sabse list sale hai uska.
Customer: Hamara sabse main item jo hai woh compress compression testing machine ka hai, Rockwell, Brinell, calibration ka hai.
Customer: Theek hai? Uska ek bhi buylead nahi hai. Compression testing machine, right, sir?
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Compression testing machine. Wait, sir, main check kar leti hoon. Semi automatic mini concrete. Mini concrete ki toh aapko aa rahi hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Mini concrete mixer chahiye hi nahi mere ko. Woh unnecessary aa raha hai na.
Executive: Okay, aapne map kar rakha hai na, sir, isliye aa rahi hai. Aur aapka main product hai yeh. Ek minute, sir, main aapko iske related bhi buyleads batati hoon.
Executive: Sir, iske related matlab jo bhi bol rahe hain aap kabhi bhi buyleads nahi aayi hai bilkul bhi?
Customer: Kabhi bhi nahi aa rahi hai. Last aap chhe mahine se nikaal ke dikha do na mere ko ek bhi.
Executive: Sir, woh toh buyleads. Isme hum deal hi nahi karte.
Executive: Okay, main isko check karti hoon. Okay, sir. Sir, compression testing machine CTM ek aayi hui hai but yeh aapke foreign se aayi hui hai. Ek aayi hui hai combined loading compression composite fixture. Yeh usi se related hota hai. Hota hai, sir, yeh different. Nahi, nahi, nahi.
Customer: Woh alag hai.
Executive: Okay, aapke main products hai aur iske related buyleads nahi aa rahi hai, sir. Right? Haan ji. Main isko update karti hoon, sir. Ek second. Aur sir, aur kaun sa aapka main product hai woh bataiye na.
Customer: Uske baad dekho na Rockwell hardness tester hai, impact testing machine hai.
Executive: Okay, dekhiye sir, isme toh aapke sare products mention hai. Ab yeh toh mujhe nahi pata hoga na ki aapka main product kaun sa hai. Like agar main baat karu toh. Aap baat kar rahi ho na. Aap se pehle toh daso aadmi phone kiye hue hain. Daso ko bataya hua hai na.
Executive: Sir, main samajh sakti hoon. Dekhiye, aapko problem aayi hai toh main samajh sakti hoon. Ek second, main wahi keh rahi hoon, sir, abhi main isko update karungi, sir. Fir main aapko teen se chaar din end mein aapko bolungi bhi jo bhi aapke account manager hain unko bolungi ki iske related unko buyleads send karein. Theek hai, sir? Uske baad main aap se response poochungi. Aur sir, machine calibration service. Ek yeh aapka. Woh hamara wohi compression testing machine hi hai.
Customer: Woh hamara wohi compression testing machine hi hai.
Customer: Rockwell hai, Brinell hai, yeh hai.
Executive: Ussi ka calibration aur uska sales hai.
Executive: Ek second, main iske related bhi dekh leti hoon.
Executive: Aapke global buyleads plant mein mostly aapke mini concrete pe hi aayi hai. Sir, agar mini concrete mein nahi karte hain toh isko hata sakte hain? Woh chahiye hi nahi mere ko.
Executive: Haan, wahi main keh rahi hoon. Agar hum isme deal nahi karte hain toh kya isko hum hata sakte hain?
Customer: Hata sakte ho madam. Jaise bilkul bhi bilkul bhi deal nahi kar rahe hain toh matlab agar in future aap deal karenge tab toh aap isko rakhiyega.
Customer: Haan, isliye main rakha hua hoon na. In future yadi hua toh main dunga but woh sirf usi ka aa raha hai na. Problem toh yeh hai.
Executive: Haan, woh toh main dekh rahi hoon sir jaise ki double yeh double garari mini concrete mixer. Theek hai? Mini concrete mixer aapko mostly buyleads is cheez se aa rahi hai. Theek hai, sir? Haan, toh woh mere ko nahi chahiye na utna buyleads.
Customer: Main kal bhi Aman ji ko bataya main ki unko pata hona chahiye concrete mixer kya cheez hai.
Customer: Theek hai? Haan ji, sir. Concrete mixer ke bare mein aapko knowledge hai kya?
Executive: Concrete sir, itna toh mujhe nahi pata ki kya aapka product yeh matlab woh jo ek machine hoti hai. Concrete mixer sun lo meri baat, main bata doon aapko. Concrete mixer jo dhalai ka machine hota hai na.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, sir.
Customer: Woh machine hai. Toh woh kya jo locally purchase karte hain. Bahar se koi bhi kisi se purchase nahi kar sakta hai. Theek hai? Ab mere ko bike yahan kharidna rahega, Mirzapur mein hai toh main yahan kharidunga. Yahan se Delhi mein jaake toh bike kharidunga nahi main. Hai na?
Executive: Haan ji, sir, yeh bhi.
Customer: Toh woh buylead bhi aap dekho ki yahan hamare aas paas ka ek bhi hai. Sare bahar ke rahte hain.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay, sir, koi nahi. Main na aapka yeh jo product hai main unko bolungi woh aapko inse related jo jo buyleads unke paas aati hai woh aapko share karein. And mini concrete mixer ke matlab itna jyada na karein. Theek hai? Jo kuch aa rahi hai ek do unko consume kijiye, sir. But mini concrete bhi jo aapke location ke nearest hai, sir. Theek hai? Baki main yeh wali buyleads aapko aapke WhatsApp pe share kara diya karungi. Theek hai, sir?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Wants buyleads for compression testing machine.

- Does not want buyleads for mini concrete mixer.

- Frequent change of account managers.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to update main product list.

- Executive will ask account manager to share buyleads.

- Executive will share buyleads on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update the product list.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, product, update
